content.question: Which of the following assertions is used by the author to support the claim in the passage?

choices.label: López Obrador is attempting to eliminate the judicial system.
López Obrador is attempting to control judicial decision making.
López Obrador is moving to establish more constitutional checks on the judiciary.
López Obrador intends to protect the power of the Senate to approve Supreme Court magistrates.

content.answer: López Obrador is attempting to control judicial decision making.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Describe the author's claim(s), perspective, evidence, and reasoning.
